gc01.cw.robf.controller

Class LogViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gc01.cw.robf.controller.LogViewController

  • public class LogViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the log view interface. Displays list of log items for selected user. Includes filter for search. Uses FXML template.

    TableView adapted from http://docs.oracle.com/javafx/2/ui_controls/table-view.htm

    TableView filtering and sorting adapted from http://code.makery.ch/blog/javafx-8-tableview-sorting-filtering/

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Rob Farthing

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method triggered when user presses Close button. Closes view.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object passed during trigger.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Method automatically called by JavaFX Application class when loading a view. Initialises the tableView of log items for the selected user. Sets up filtered view for interactive searching on table columns.
